reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Parker is knowledgeable and approachable, but her lectures can be a bit fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Excellent professor! Clear explanations and very helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Good professor, but the exams are difficult and often cover material not discussed in class.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Great professor with a lot of industry experience. Assignments are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Davis knows her stuff, but she doesn't engage well with students. Lectures can be boring.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Fantastic lecturer! Makes history come alive with engaging stories and discussions.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting classes and helpful feedback on assignments. Sometimes unclear on expectations.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Knows the material well, but his teaching style is dry and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Gonzalez is amazing! Very passionate about the subject and always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer with a wealth of knowledge. Assignments are tough but rewarding.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Wonderful professor! Encourages deep thinking and offers great feedback on papers.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting ideas, but often goes off on tangents. Not the most organized lectures.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Moore is very knowledgeable and passionate about art, but her lectures can be a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Challenging but fair. Professor Clark has a lot of practical experience and shares real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is an excellent teacher. Very supportive and makes the subject matter interesting.

reviews.subject: Business Management
reviews.review: Good professor, but his lectures can be a bit repetitive. Assignments are straightforward.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson is a solid professor. Clear explanations, but her exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Engaging and insightful. Professor Baker makes anthropology fascinating with his real-life examples.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Dr. Hall makes complex concepts easy to understand and offers great support.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knows the material, but his lectures are hard to follow. Not very approachable outside of class.
